column4: hello, i have just installed ubuntu, really nice :), but there is one thing i dont get, i created a user, it toled me that it will work like root, now i try to adduser from the user, and it wont let me, it is asking for a root pass, when i enter that users pass, it wont let me
: just type under a terminal window
: "sudo adduser <user_name>" and give your CURRENT user's password you set up on install
